listitem.para: take is a function that accepts an integer value and a list and returns a list

sect2.title: Take One
sect2.para:
See a problem?
testTake :: String -> Bool testTake s = length (take 5 s) == 5

para.programlisting: Main> ourCheck testTake Falsifiable, after 0 tests: ""

sect2.title: Take Two
sect2.para:
testTake' :: String -> Bool testTake' s = length (take 5 s) <= 5 Better!
Main> ourCheck testTake' OK, passed 500 tests.
